body:
הלו גויים טיפשים

Would you believe me if I told you males are also biologically inferior this way? I bet not even though I have the evidence for it. I'm a guy so I'm not just being biased towards myself either. Men excel only in spatial skills and physical strength, women are more well-rounded and have more sophisticated brains, and beat men at basically everything else. Even "male" fields like STEM and video games, females still slimly outperform them. Worse, male is the expendable sex: women are treasured unconditionally but a man's only worth is in what he provides. Don't deny it, it's the truth. Women and children first.

Yeah, genetics are everything and completely unfair, but they don't always swing in favor of male Europeans.
body_html:
הלו גויים טיפשים

Would you believe me if I told you males are also biologically inferior this way? I bet not even though I have the evidence for it. I'm a guy so I'm not just being biased towards myself either. Even "male" fields like STEM and video games, females still slimly outperform them. Worse, male is the expendable sex: women are treasured unconditionally but a man's only worth is in what he provides. Don't deny it, it's the truth. Women and children first.

Yeah, genetics are everything and completely unfair, but they don't always swing in favor of male Europeans.
